general.description: Erathan Base has been secretely built by the Gham Garri to prevent Adrim exfiltration to the Baartish Intersystem. It is a lonely stealth station with a fanatic crew of patrol pilots, eager to wait for days hidden in the Long Link systems until they detect a would-be "ghost ship" to ambush.
general.bar: Only Gham Garri people, mostly pilots, eager to fight any non-Rith who would try showing up
